text: Dan, commonly known as Ugly Dan, is a Gray that worked in the Helium-3 mines of Lykos on Mars providing security and keeping the lowRed miners in line. He was the Captain of the Gray soldiers in Lykos.
name: Ugly Dan

text: Ugly Dan is described by Darrow as a "greasy bastard." His eyes as "ice cubes rolled in ash." He is apparently very tanned. His voice is referred to as stale and heavy like the air inside a frysuit. Dan has an old mechanical arm as a result of losing the original during a military conflict in Eurasia.
name: Ugly Dan

text: Dan is very insecure about his mechanical arm.
name: Ugly Dan

text: Dan once served on the front lines of a conflict in Eurasia on Earth, but was pulled back after he lost an arm that couldn't be replaced.
name: Ugly Dan

text: Dan arrested Darrow and Eo as they were leaving the Bubble Garden.
name: Ugly Dan

text: When Darrow returns to Lykos after the Lion's Rain, he has Dan personally guide him to the Bubble Garden so he can visit the spot where he buried Eo.
name: Ugly Dan

text: It is unknown what became of Ugly Dan after Lykos was liberated by The Solar Republic, but Pierce confirmed that he is still alive at the time of Iron Gold.
name: Ugly Dan
